abstract: The advantage over computer-based social networks, companies believe, is the ability to know where a cellphone is, thanks to global positioning satellites and related technologies.
snippet: The advantage over computer-based social networks, companies believe, is the ability to know where a cellphone is, thanks to global positioning satellites and related technologies.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Social networks may be nothing new to habitués of the Internet. Several years of competition among Facebook, MySpace and Friendster have generated tens of millions of members.

headline.main: Social Networking Moves to the Cellphone
headline.print_headline: Social Networking Moves to the Cellphone
